column4: I'm trying to compile some stuff on this new edgy install and whenever I run make -f Makefile.cvs I get errors like this: /usr/share/aclocal/libglade.m4:7: warning: underquoted definition of AM_PATH_LIBGLADE     Any idea what might be causing this?
if not, you might wanna run sudo apt-get install libglade
if I echo that variable then nothing shows up...
